attributes.action: ensure that the criminals in the TV quiz call industry are brought to justice (=Jail).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The criminals in the TV quiz call scandals have defrauded more money than is stolen in all the muggings in one year.
We petition the PM to not stand by as the criminals get away with nothing more than a vague promise to not do it again. We expect serious criminal investigations and then prison sentences. Just because it is 'only' white-collar crime doesn't mean it isn't crime.

Also, investigations into Misfeasance in Public Office by all those employed by Ofcom & Icstis should be began because of their abject failure to do anything, as usual.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
